channel.title: [DELTA] NPC directions
channel.description: I'm using delta and I noticed when I add NPCs into the autospawn.cfg they all spawn normally but face South. Is there any way to get them to face other directions? I know when I add objects I can use codes like "-3,, "-2", "-1", and "0" to make the objects face other directions, but is there any way to turn the NPCs possibly using the same format?

item.title: [DELTA] NPC directions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

There should be a way. I believe there’s an “direction” flag for the npc update procedure.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I’m using delta and I noticed when I add NPCs into the autospawn.cfg they all spawn normally but face South. Is there any way to get them to face other directions? I know when I add objects I can use codes like "-3, “-2”, “-1”, and “0” to make the objects face other directions, but is there any way to turn the NPCs possibly using the same format?
